actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that compliance with a subpoena issued by a committee or subcommittee may be enforced by the issuing committee or subcommittee.

summary.text: Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that compliance with a subpena issued by a House committee or subcommittee, in the conduct of any investigations or activities and authorized by a majority of the committee, may be enforced by the issuing committee or subcommittee.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that compliance with a subpoena issued by a committee or subcommittee may be enforced by the issuing committee or subcommittee.
